subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally written as {{zh-l|㓝}}, {{Han compound|井|刂|ls=ic|nocap=1}}.  Later corrupted as ⿰幵刂, {{Han compound|幵|刂|c1=p|c2=s|ls=psc|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[penalty]], [[punishment]]
# to [[punish]]
# to [[execute]] (to kill as a penalty)
